Trade/Device Name(s): Verigene® Respiratory Virus Plus Nucleic Acid Test (RV+)
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the Verigene Respiratory Virus Plus Nucleic Acid Test (RV+) for detection and identification of multiple respiratory virus nucleic acids in nasopharyngeal swabs using the Verigene System.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative multiplex nucleic acid test intended to simultaneously detect and identify Influenza A (including H1, H3, 2009 H1N1), Influenza B, and RSV (subtypes A and B) nucleic acids in nasopharyngeal swab specimens from individuals with signs and symptoms of respiratory tract infection to aid diagnosis, when used in conjunction with other clinical and laboratory findings.
